title: Dice Box
subtitle: For every moment you need dice

intro.title: üé≤ What is Dice Box?
intro.desc: Dice Box is a 3D dice simulator that runs directly on the web without installation. Roll dice anytime, anywhere for TRPG sessions, board games, or simple bets. It uses a powerful 3D physics engine to provide realistic randomness like real dice.

features.title: ‚ú® Key Features
features.list1: Various Dice: D4, D6, D8, D12, D20 supported for TRPG needs
features.list2: Realistic Physics: Simulation based on physics collisions, not just random numbers
features.list3: Customization: Change dice colors and tray themes (Felt, Wood, etc.)
features.list4: Share Results: Capture dice roll results as images to share with friends
features.list5: Mobile Optimized: Mobile-friendly interface including shake-to-roll feature

d20.title: D20 (Icosahedron)
d20.desc: The most important die in d20 systems like D&D. Used for attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Experience the thrill of a Critical Miss (1) or a Critical Hit (20)!

d6.title: D6 (Cube)
d6.desc: The most common and familiar die. Widely used for character ability generation, weapon damage (Shortsword), or spell damage (Fireball).

d8.title: D8 (Octahedron)
d8.desc: Mainly used for weapon damage like Longsword or Warhammer, or Cleric's weapon damage.

footer.disclaimer: Dice Box is a fan-made project and is not an official tool of any specific TRPG system.
